import axios from 'axios'; // url 

const url = 'http://localhost:5000/posts'; // get all posts

export const fetchPosts = () => axios.get(url); // create post 

export const createPost = newPost => axios.post(url, newPost); //like post 

export const likePost = id => axios.patch(`${url}/${id}/likePost`); // update post 

export const updatePost = (id, updatedPost) => axios.patch(`${url}/${id}`, updatedPost); // delete post 

export const deletePost = id => axios.delete(`${url}/${id}`);
